backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles, access control, and audio submission workflows with permission checks and metadata storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a routing update tied to TanStack Router and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Home page that welcomes users and renders the Creator Zone submission tab.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabs for pending submissions, approved audio, and user profiles, including approval and rejection logic.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneTab.t: Creator form allowing users to submit audio metadata for admin approval.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Full-screen loading indicator with animated spinner and optional message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component managing navigation, authentication state, and identity-driven cache resets. Conditionally shows admin Studio link based on user profile and login state.
frontend/src/components/HydrationTimeout: Empty file placeholder for a hydration timeout UI component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a user profile setup component.
frontend/src/components/SafeRoot.tsx: Empty file placeholder intended for an app root wrapper with safety or fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/StudioTab.tsx: Empty file placeholder for a Studio tab component.
frontend/src/contexts/HydrationHardExitC: Empty context placeholder likely meant for managing hydration-related exit behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles, roles, admin checks, artist lists, and audio submissions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and CSS.
frontend/src/pages/Studio.tsx: Admin-only page that loads the callerâ€™s profile, redirects non-admins, and renders the admin panel.
frontend/src/router.ts: Router instance creation and type registration for TanStack Router.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Router configuration defining root layout and routes for home and Studio pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, plugin integrations, custom colors, animations, fonts, and container settings. Extends theme with OKLCH-based design tokens and accordion keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state describing the VAANI MVP backend/UI architecture, admin-only Studio workflow, and root UI simplification. Notes include admin rules, routing constraints, and known UI/auth regressions to fix.
